滿.definition: to fill; full; filled; packed; fully; completely; quite; to reach the limit; to satisfy; satisfied; contented

滿不在乎.definition: not in the least concerned (idiom); reckless; couldn't give a damn about it; unperturbed; couldn't care less; harum scarum

滿剌加.definition: Ming Dynasty name for modern day Malacca; see also 馬六甲|马六甲[Ma3 liu4 jia3]

滿口.definition: a full mouth of (sth tangible); to have the mouth exclusively filled with (a certain language, lies, promises, etc); (to agree etc) unreservedly

滿口之乎者也.pinyin: man3 kou3 zhi1 hu1 zhe3 ye3
滿口之乎者也.definition: mouth full of literary phrases; to spout the classics

滿口胡柴.definition: to spout nonsense; to bullshit endlessly

滿口胡言.definition: to spout nonsense; to bullshit endlessly

滿口髒話.definition: to pour out obscenities; filthy mouthed

滿員.definition: full complement; at full strength; no vacancies

滿嘴.definition: a full mouth of (sth physical); to have the mouth exclusively filled with (a certain language, lies, promises etc)

滿嘴起皰.definition: to have lips covered in blisters

滿嘴跑火車.definition: (idiom) to have a glib tongue; to talk big

滿嘴跑舌頭.definition: to talk without thinking; to drivel

滿園春色.definition: everything in the garden is lovely

滿地可.definition: Montreal (chiefly used in Hong Kong and the Chinese community in Canada) (from Cantonese 滿地可|满地可 Mun5 dei6 ho2)

滿地找牙.definition: to be looking for one's teeth all over the floor; (fig.) to get beaten up badly; to beat the crap out of (sb)

滿坐寂然.definition: the whole audience silent with expectation

滿坑滿谷.definition: (idiom) all over the place; in every nook and cranny; packed to the rafters

滿城盡帶黃金甲.pinyin: Man3 cheng2 jin4 dai4 huang2 jin1 jia3
滿城盡帶黃金甲.definition: Curse of the Golden Flower (2007), period drama movie by Zhang Yimou

滿城風雨.definition: lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom); fig. a big scandal; an uproar; the talk of the town

滿堂.definition: whole audience; a sellout (capacity audience); jam-packed

滿堂彩.definition: everyone present applauds; universal acclaim; a standing ovation; to bring the house down

滿堂灌.definition: cramming (as a teaching method); rote learning

滿堂紅.definition: success across the board; victory in everything one touches

滿天繁星.definition: lit. whole sky, a multitude of stars

滿天飛.definition: to rush around everywhere; always active

滿孝.definition: at the end of the mourning period; to fulfill one's filial duties of mourning

滿山遍野.definition: covering the whole land; over hills and dales

滿州.definition: Manchou township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

滿州鄉.definition: Manchou township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

滿帆.definition: under full sail; going as fast as possible

滿心.definition: one's whole heart; from the bottom of one's heart

滿懷.definition: to have one's heart filled with; (to collide) full on; (of farm animals) heavy with young

滿打滿算.definition: taking everything into account (idiom); when all is said and done

滿招損，謙受益.pinyin: man3 zhao1 sun3 , qian1 shou4 yi4
滿招損，謙受益.definition: (idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit; pride comes before a fall

滿族.definition: Manchu ethnic group of Liaoning province

滿月.definition: full moon; whole month; baby's one-month old birthday

滿有譜.definition: to have a clearcut idea; to have firm guidelines; to have confidence; to be sure; to be certain

滿服.definition: at the end of the mourning period; to fulfill one's filial duties of mourning

滿期.definition: to fall due; to come to the end of a term; to expire

滿格.definition: (of battery level, signal level etc) at full capacity; at maximum strength

滿洲里.definition: Manzhouli, county-level city, Mongolian Manzhuur xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia

滿洲里市.definition: Manzhouli, county-level city, Mongolian Manzhuur xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia

滿清.definition: Manchurian Qing (refers to the Qing dynasty, esp. at its decline, or as an anti-Qing slogan)

滿溢.definition: to be full to overflowing; to be brimming over with

滿漢全席.definition: the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty; (fig.) a sumptuous banquet

滿盤.definition: a plateful; comprehensive; the full works (e.g. a banquet); the full price

滿盤皆輸.definition: see 一著不慎，滿盤皆輸|一着不慎，满盘皆输[yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1]

滿目.definition: fills the eyes (of a beautiful view, scene of desolation etc)

滿目琳琅.definition: lit. to fill one's eyes with glittering jewels; a literary masterpiece or sb of extraordinary talent (idiom)

滿目瘡痍.definition: a scene of devastation meets the eye everywhere one looks (idiom)

滿眼.definition: (of tears etc) filling the eyes; (of scenery etc) filling one's field of view

滿福堡.definition: (Tw) McDonald's McMuffin or similar breakfast sandwich made with an English muffin

滿腔.definition: one's heart filled with; full of (joy)

滿腹牢騷.definition: lit. belly full of complaints (idiom); discontent; always moaning and complaining

滿腹經綸.definition: full of political wisdom (idiom); politically astute; with encyclopedic experience of state policy

滿臉生花.definition: all smiles; beaming from ear to ear

滿臉風塵.definition: lit. with a face full of dust; showing the hardships of travel (idiom)

滿舵.definition: on full rudder; turning as sharply as possible

滿貫.definition: to win every trick in a card game; grand slam; fig. total success

滿足.definition: to satisfy; to meet (the needs of); satisfied; content

滿載而歸.definition: (idiom) to return from a rewarding journey

滿門抄斬.definition: to execute the whole family and confiscate their property

滿面.definition: across one's whole face; (smiling) from ear to ear

滿頭大汗.definition: brow beaded with sweat; perspiring freely

滿額.definition: the full amount; to fulfill the quota

滿點.definition: full working hours; full marks; perfect score; (fig.) (after a attribute) couldn't be more (happy, romantic etc)
